macroSpec.desc: defines the range of attribute values expressed as an XML name or identifier
definisce la gamma di valori di attributi espressi come identificatore o nome XML
define la gama de valores de atributos expresados como identificador o un nombre en XML.

remarks.p: Attributes using this datatype must contain a single word which follows the rules defining a legal XML name: for example they cannot include whitespace or begin with digits.
